channel.title: Setup | KubeDB CLI on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Setup | KubeDB CLI on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Install KubeDB CLI
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Installation Guide In order to install KubeDB CLI as kubectl-plugin, download the kubectl-dba binary and move it anywhere on you PATH. macOS Linux Windows macOS $ wget -O kubectl-dba https://github.com/kubedb/cli/releases/download/v2020.07.10-beta.0/kubectl-dba-darwin-amd64 \ && chmod +x kubectl-dba \ && sudo mv kubectl-dba /usr/local/bin/ Linux $ wget -O kubectl-dba https://github.com/kubedb/cli/releases/download/v2020.07.10-beta.0/kubectl-dba-linux-amd64 \ && chmod +x kubectl-dba \ && sudo mv kubectl-dba /usr/local/bin/ Windows Download the latest release vv2020.
